definitions.definition: Conversation or debate concerning a particular topic.
examples: There was then a long discussion of whether to capitalize words like "east".
This topic is not open to discussion .
My discussion with the professor was very enlightening.

definitions.definition: Text giving further detail on a subject.
examples: Under each heading, you will find a discussion .

main_definition: Conversation or debate concerning a particular topic.
secondary_definitions: Text giving further detail on a subject.
( medicine , obsolete ) The dispersion of a tumour .
